thread.title: Chris Dayson
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Chris Dayson

author: Chris Dayson
title: Chris Dayson
text:
On a recent Intrepid trip my wife and I were on the southern trip of Mexico when we receive the terrible news her mother didn't have long to live.
The guide (Victor) stayed up with us until 2am helping us book flights back to LA and arranging for a taxi to get us to the airport. He was then up again at 5am to ensure our taxi met us and took us to the right airport.
Our booking agent (Shae) at Intrepid assisted where she could from Australia, managed the cancellation of our second tour a week later and followed up with everything once we got back.
Furthermore, we also received a beautiful bunch of flowers and a note of condolence the day after we got back (after learning she passed away while en route).
This only enriches the professional and personal experience we receive when booking and enjoying an Intrepid tour anywhere in the world.
